alert.note: Alert for Atoka; Bryan (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 02 at 4:46PM CST until March 02 at 5:30PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Bryan County in southeastern Oklahoma... Southeastern Atoka County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 530 PM CST. * At 445 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles south of Lane, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lane, Bentley, Darwin and southeastern McGee Creek Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
